body_html:
@eamartin A small amount of non-determinstism in TensorFlow computations is expected on GPU. Ongoing efforts are put forth and FR is in place. 18096 Latest developments from algorithms and hardware architecture perspectives reaped success where challenges remain.

Please resort to workarounds, e.g. tf.add for now until more concrete solutions come forth.

@eamartin A small amount of non-determinstism in TensorFlow computations is expected on GPU. Ongoing efforts are put forth and FR is in place. 18096 Latest developments from algorithms and hardware architecture perspectives reaped success where challenges remain.
Please resort to workarounds, e.g. tf.add for now until more concrete solutions come forth.
body:
@eamartin A small amount of non-determinstism in TensorFlow computations is expected on GPU. Ongoing efforts are put forth and FR is in place. [18096](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/18096) Latest developments from algorithms and hardware architecture perspectives reaped success where challenges remain.

Please resort to workarounds, e.g. tf.add for now until more concrete solutions come forth.
